info.description: Jarvan the Impaler. AP build that is focused on throwing big flags.
how it works: You build AP items, going full damage.
how to play: Playing AP Jarvan IV build, your default rush is Luden's Companion. In cases, when an enemy team is full of tanks and HP stackers, go Liandry's Torment.

Adapt to an enemy team. Are they full of tanks, and they rush tons of Magic Resist? You rush Void Staff as #2 or #3 item to counter MR stacking. Their team has champs with lots of healing? Rush Oblivion Orb as #2 item (upgrade to Morellonomicon as 4th or 5th item).
Somebody is going after you each fight? Always getting ulted by enemy assassins? Rush Zhonya's Hourglass.
how to play champion: Your Demacian Standard (E) is a main source of damage.
You can cast Demacian Standard (E) facing another direction - so you can trick enemies into feeling safe, but you still hit them.
You play as squishy mage. Play safe and from afar.
You can go in with E + Q and use CC, but be careful. You are squishy.
You can engage with Cataclysm (R) and escape with Demacian Standard (E)+Dragon Strike (Q), trapping an enemy team.
tricks champion: You can use Demacian Standard (E) for brush control.
Remember that Dragon Strike (Q) reduces target's armor!
Switch targets often in fights to fully use your Martial Cadence (Passive) for more damage!
Combo #1: Q + E + Flash. Just Q + E and during the last frames of animation, you can Flash into enemy knocking them up.

Combo #2: If you have enough Ability Haste, you can put E, wait and Q to it and cast second E hitting your target. This is especially cool with AP builds. So you can cast E while sliding to existing E.
tricks champion riot: You can use the Dragon Strike / Demacian Standard combo to get out of your own Cataclysm arenas.
Split your basic attacks on different champions at the beginning of fights to maximize damage.
Use Demacian Standard as a scouting tool when worried about incoming enemies.

tooltip: If an enemy team has started stacking MR:
Void Staff - more damage, Magic Penetration % and AP. More universal overall.
Cryptbloom - less Magic Penetration %, less AP, but offers Ability Haste and AOE heal on takedowns.
Overall, Void Staff is better, Cryptbloom might be good in situations in which you don't need more damage (because other players do it), but more sustain in fights.
If you feel like it's going to be last fight:
Elixir of Iron - for more survivability and vs CC.
Elixir of Sorcery - more AP, true damage to champions and turrets
Seeker's Armguard - one time use that can win a fight.
